summary: This appears to be a brief email exchange from August 14, 2019, where the sender comments on an interview about Jeffrey Epstein, calling it 'absurd'. The document is part of the Epstein case files and shows internal communication about media coverage.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses an interview about Jeffrey Epstein, with the sender calling it 'absurd'.

keyFacts: An email dated August 14, 2019, discusses an interview about Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender of the email characterizes the interview as 'absurd'.
The document is part of the Epstein case files (EFTA00068083).
